reg_pit.acttitle: Medical Research (BC Cancer Agency) and Health Status Registry Act
reg_pit.title: British Columbia Cancer Agency Research Information Regulation

change.changenote: Section 1 definition of "Act" BEFORE amended by BC Reg 215/2018, effective November 15, 2018.
Section 1 definition of "agency" BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 215/2018, effective November 15, 2018.

bcl:definition.bcl:text: agency means the British Columbia Cancer Agency;

change.changenote: Section 2 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 215/2018, effective November 15, 2018.

bcl:section.bcl:text: Information that may be requested by the agency pursuant to section 9 (1) of the Act is limited to information listed in Appendices 1 to 3.
